channel.title: Firefox and java
channel.description:
Well im currently running kubuntu, everything works fine but when i run java applets they load fine and work fine for a few minutes or even just a few seconds, then firefox just crashes randomly.
Anyone know a solution or to whats causing this?

item.title: Firefox and java
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You are using a 32-bit OS right?

Thanks, well it works fine on konqueror and opera so i guess ill just use opera :d.

item.title: Firefox and java
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I use Firefox and Java and they both work fine together on Ubuntu for me.

I just followed the steps from UbuntuGuide.org. Hope this helps.
UbuntuGuide Link to Install Java

If the above doesn’t help, then go into Synaptic Package Manager and uninstall java and then reinstall using the above methods. If it still doesn’t work, then I have no idea what it is.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox and java
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:143228”]Opera.

Nah, I wouldn’t be so insensitive as to ignore your needs as an attempt to further the Opera cause.

http://www.google.com/search?q=kubuntu+firefox+java+crash

A lot of people have your problem apparently. And would it matter if its kubuntu or ubuntu? Because most people with the problem are on Ubuntu.[/quote]

Kubuntu basically is ubuntu,

But thanks i think ill try out opera, i never thought of that :rolleyes:

Read full topic
